Package de.moritzbruder.gameoflife.gui.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldComponent
    A JClickableComponent subclass that shows a given Field
    JNumericTextField
    Extension of JTextField that is pecified to allow only input of numbers Created by morit on 21.09.2017.
    SizeDialog
    A Dialog that allows the User to change the size of the Game Field
    StatsComponent
    A simple component that shows the ratio of dead and alive cells Created by Moritz Bruder on 20.09.2017.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FieldComponent.IndexOutsideFieldException
    Exception used to indicate that a pixel-position is outside the displayed field
